title.rendered: Ambassador Adamu Ibrahim Lamuwa received on a courtesy visit, Ambassador Nura Abba Rimi and Ambassador Ella Nicholas Agbo

content.rendered:
The Permanent Secretary, Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Ambassador Adamu Ibrahim Lamuwa received on a courtesy visit, Ambassador Nura Abba Rimi and Ambassador Ella Nicholas Agbo, newly appointed Permanent Secretaries of the Federal Civil Service on Monday, 27th November, 2023.
Some Directorate Cadre Officers were present as the Permanent Secretary welcomed his guests, who are also Officers of the Nigerian Foreign Service to the Ministry.
